proj.name: vq
proj.file: Period in seconds when information about senders is cached. So, if someone sends 5 messages within this time only one automatic reponse will be generated.
Connect information used while connecting with PostgreSQL server.
Mode of files created in qmail's home. 0 means octal form.

Level of splits of domain name. Directory "domains" includes domains registered in system. It's possible to lower number of entries per directory by creating tree. If you leave this with value 3, path for "test.org.pl" in "domains" will look: domains/pl/org/test/test.org.pl. If you don't want any splits set it to 0.

Level of splits of user name. To lower number of entries in directory containing user mailboxes tree is created. For value 3 entries in domain's directory look as following: for user test, path is t/e/s/test/.
Mode of files created in vq's home.
Mode of directories created in vq's home.
Chars treated as a separator between user and domain in e-mail addresses.

proj.name: freemail
proj.file: First line creating XML source which will be processed to create HTML output. Remeber that internal coding is UTF-8 (which is by the way default XML coding).
Character which replaces all disallowed characters. It's used when creating XML/HTML output - replaces all characters which could invalidate output.
Program which will be executed after adding user, program will be called with following arguments: domain_name login users_info_id

proj.name: host_add
proj.file: Character which replaces all disallowed characters. It's used when creating XML/HTML output - replaces all characters which could invalidate output.
First line creating XML source which will be processed to create HTML output. Remeber that internal coding is UTF-8 (which is by the way default XML coding).
File which includes list of allowed domains.

proj.name: hosting
proj.file: Program which will be executed after adding user, program will be called with following arguments: domain_name login users_info_id
Chars allowed in WWW aliases (prefix field)
Program run to change links in htdocs directory.
Character which replaces all disallowed characters. It's used when creating XML/HTML output - replaces all characters which could invalidate output.

proj.name: pg2fs
proj.file: Mode of files created for dnscache.
Command used to compila data.cdb for tinydns.
Mode of file created in tinydns directory.

proj.name: vqsignup
proj.file: File which includes list of allowed domains.
Character which replaces all disallowed characters. It's used when creating XML/HTML output - replaces all characters which could invalidate output.
First line creating XML source which will be processed to create HTML output. Remeber that internal coding is UTF-8 (which is by the way default XML coding).

proj.file: File which includes list of allowed domains.
Character which replaces all disallowed characters. It's used when creating XML/HTML output - replaces all characters which could invalidate output.
Program which will be executed after adding user, program will be called with following arguments: domain_name login users_info_id
First line creating XML source which will be processed to create HTML output. Remeber that internal coding is UTF-8 (which is by the way default XML coding).
First line creating XML source which will be processed to create HTML output. Remeber that internal coding is UTF-8 (which is by the way default XML coding).

proj.file: First line creating XML source which will be processed to create HTML output. Remeber that internal coding is UTF-8 (which is by the way default XML coding).

proj.name: vqwww
proj.file: Mode of file created to store session's information.
Timeout of session, counted in minutes. If user is idle more than this time it will have to authorize.
Number of possible redirections for one address.
Character which replaces all disallowed characters. It's used when creating XML/HTML output - replaces all characters which could invalidate output.

Number of splits done on cfilesess session dir name. To lower number of entries for main directory containing sessions special tree is created. For value of 3 session is stored in following manner: session id: 3344556677, path: 33/44/55/3344556677.
First line creating XML source which will be processed to create HTML output. Remeber that internal coding is UTF-8 (which is by the way default XML coding).
Place for storing sessions with cfilesess.
